name: Will Tomanek Jr
text: I ordered delivery to my hotel and it arrived on time! The pizza was cooked just right and was exactly what I expected. The nachoStix were great as well. Will definitely reorder in the future.

name: Pierced Ninja
text: I order from toppers once a week. And it is by FAR the best pizza i have ever had! The delivery driver is always fast and very polite. The food is amazing. Top notch bursting with flavor. I rate Toppers in Highland heights Kentucky 5 stars …More

name: Larissa Scott
text: Toppers is a great company! They stay true to their promise of keeping customers happy! The area supervisor took time out of his busy schedule to address my concerns and ensured me that the company is making great strides to improve this …More

name: Mike Gibson
text: It's a basic pickup / delivery pizza joint. The small dining area was over run with the kids of the employees. This is unprofessional and not the place for periodically unsupervised children. …More

name: Tyler Honschopp
text: Ordered here last night - medium 2 topping pizza and 1/2 lb. boneless wings with blue cheese. The pizza was one of the thinnest I've ever eaten, practically no substance to it and was slightly burned. Then the wings I ordered didn't come …More

name: Jakefreakinglee
text: So there I was, so eager, and full of excitement, as my two beautiful children, my trophy wife and i, wait upon the arrival of our annual pizza day. On our family holiday, we all decided upon toppers pizza. Splended idea it was, However, …More

name: Kylie Bryant
text: Toppers is by far the best pizza place.... The workers are fast and nice.... I told ally friends if they want fast and good pizza head straight to toppers.... Honestly it's better than Little Caesars and Pizza hut ❤️❤️❤️

name: Mark Cupito
text: Called and they said that they weren’t taking any orders because they were training 2 people. I asked; even for pick-up orders? And the person I spoke to had confirmed. Pretty terrible business. …More

text: What can I say? These guys are fantastic and know how to take care of their customers. Thank you for what you did! …More

text: This location doesn’t even deserve the star I’m being forced to give. I’ve ordered from here twice and didn’t receive my order TWICE. I’m not sure what possessed me to give them another try after a year of not even thinking about them but I …More

name: Russ Eckert
text:
Last year this review would have read: Great over-the-top pizza at a good price.
As of now: 1/5 - will not order again. Dough was not fully cooked, multiple …More

name: Troix Townsend
text: Excellent pizza. The dough is made fresh daily. They have tons and tons of topping choices and dipping sauces. And being open till 2am and delivering that late is amazing!

name: Zinfidel Beats
text: It’s an okay pizza place. But the ads say to compare to dominos. I have to say that the topper stix are decent, not a huge fan of the three cheese garlic. The boneless wings are drowning in sauce I think instead of pouring two cups of sauce …More

name: Kim A
text: Quoted an hour for a pizza and they showed up an hour and half later. They used to have great service, but I always get the wrong thing, it’s cold, or undercooked and they always take longer than other places.   The manager is very …More

text: What in the trailer park hell was going on in there it took an HR to get a 15 min order and there was all these kids running around y'all need to stop mething around and be professional at least at work I'm done won't go back there loved …More

name: Sarah James
text: The food here is always soooooooooo good.  We love being able to walk over from campus anytime we want and carb up undercover!  all the staff seem super excited and love to talk about Toppers.  Wish there were more Toppers around.  Down with lame pizza, only Toppers!!!

text: One of the best place to get pizzas during night's!

text: Was genuinely conserned there was meth in my pizza from one of the workers accidently dropping their stash in there.

name: Morgan Brewer
text: Deserves -1,000 stars. I have ordered a pizza and hour and a half ago and we called twice saying/asking about our orders and all we ordered was breadsticks. A team member was yelling at us and getting a horrible attitude that was …More

name: David H.
text: Not a lot of pizza for $18. And the taste wasn't super stellar to make up for it.

name: RaeAnn Hounshell
text: Id give less stars if possible. I ordered a beef and pickle pizza, when it came i got sausage and pepperoni. I called to get it fixed and they said that it would be here in an hour maybe an hour and a half TOPS. Its been two and a half hours, ive called and they said it was on its way. Come one toppers get your stuff together.

name: Daniel Cain
text: Food looks good ,they have a lot of stuff.  Good people !

name: Alp B
text: Food was great and the manager Katie was so friendly! I will definitely be back!!

name: Alexander TheGreatest
text: Their pizza's are so good! They've got so many delicious varieties! I typically work late hours and it's great to know they're still open for delivery so late! But the only problem with this is, after around 1, it's almost impossible to get …More

name: Don Pablo Vasquez
text: Good pizza but they need to lower some prices!

name: Colleen Merman
text: Terrible service. We have had multiple bad experiences and have always decided to give it one more try-but I am giving up! A few months ago we called at 11:30 on a Friday on our way home, we were on hold for 20 minutes, and arrived at the …More

name: brannon billiter
text: They told me 25 minutes went there paid and the worker give my pizza to her boyfriend, then told me they could make another pizza it just be 20 minutes  I got a refund. Worse customer service ever.

name: Chris Delaney
text: Place is a joke. Don't give you the money you are stressed to get and it's filthy. Also, ALL the managers are burnt out, closer early or lie and say no driver

name: Michael Gibson
text: You like pizza. You like wings. Well you will love toppers.

name: Sidney Souffrance
text: Toppers is an awesome upbeat pizza joint thats big on quality. Most well known pizza resturants dont use fresh dough for their pizza like Toppers. With bold and exciting flavors its sure to keep you coming back. Pizza reinvented indeed.

name: Malcolm McAfee
text: Toppers Pizza is one of those pizza places that once you try it, you start comparing other pizza chains to it thinking, "Man... Their ____ isn't as good as Toppers..." …More

text: Buffalo chicken pizza is my fav an the bacon cheese stix

name: Mike Mills
text: Called about midnight after trying to navigate tje mobile site for 45 mimutes, was told the 2 pizzas would take 2 hours to arrive, that was fine, they arrive about 2 hours later, issue being they were missing one of my pizzas. Call back ask …More

text: Great food and sides! Personable delivery team! Brittsny is GREAT!!!

text: This is two years in a row that we've ordered late night pizza from this place to be delivered to our hotel during our company's annual meeting, and it is two years in a row that we've been told it would be 30 minutes for delivery only to …More

text: Just tried this place last weekend. They are quite good, at first I thought they were a bit pricey for a pizza place... Was maybe $23.00 for X-Large I ordered, but after I got it - I found that their toppings and all that on this one …More

name: Gary Allgeier
text: Was surprised at the number of toppings available.  Good pizza, crust good enough on its own.

name: Damian Nowak
text: There was four of us eating pizzas inside their store back in October 2016. Pizza was okay. The temperature in the store was not. Cold wind was blowing directly at us. I'm not sensitive to cold - I'm a fat guy with a lot of insulation, and …More

name: John Mark Vanderpool
text: Great pizza! Try the cinnamon sticks. They're wonderful.

name: Nick Bissonnette
text: It's good pizza and they are open until 3am but, the price is pretty high.

name: Calvin Moore
text: I live literally two minutes away and it took an hour and a half for two orders of wings. They were cold when they got here. Horrible delivery service. ALWAYS late. Will not order again.

text: Good product but a little high priced.

text: Absolutely unacceptable service. They purposely ignored our calls because it was relatively near to closing time. Unprofessional and will not recommend In the future.

text: I ordered for delivery and it took 2 hours from now as I’m writing this review and no one was answer my calls because the store was closed , so I’m going to the store tomorrow to have my money back stupid restaurant
